U

updateBasePosition() - Method in class game.Ship
Updates the basePosition class variable so that it stores the x and y position of the Ship's upper left corner in the grid.
updateBoards() - Method in class controller.GameController
Checks that the game has both a host and a joining player who have uploaded their boards to the database, then downloads the opponents board and starts the game
updateBoardShadows() - Method in class controller.GameController
Updates the shadows that indicate who's turn it is
updateGameOver() - Method in class database.DatabaseConnector
Checks if there is a winner of the current Game in the database and updates the local Game object
updatePosition() - Method in class game.Ship
Adds the saved offset from the Ship's rotation to make calculation correct.
updateSize() - Method in class game.Ship
Updates the size of the ship to be displayed with the correct width and height in the Board's grid
updateSize(AnchorPane) - Method in class controller.ViewComponent
Updates the size of the window to fit a specific AnchorPane
updateText() - Method in class controller.GameController
Updates the user's, opponent's and game's name it the game window
updateUserScore(int, int) - Method in class database.DatabaseConnector
Updates the score of the user.
uploadActionCache - Variable in class game.Game
the local user's attacks that need to be uploaded to the database
uploadAttack(int, int) - Method in class game.Board
Adds an attack to the upload cache Will be uploaded later by the another thread
uploadCachedActions() - Method in class game.Game
tries to upload cached actions to the database
uploadCachedActions(String, int) - Method in class game.Game
uploads cached actions to database
uploadFeedback() - Method in class controller.FeedbackController
Uploads the written feedback via a DatabaseConnector
uploadFeedback(String, String) - Method in class database.DatabaseConnector
Uploads feedback to the database
uploadResults() - Method in class database.DatabaseConnector
Uploads the results of the local game.
uploadShipCoordinates() - Method in class game.Board
Confirms the placements of the ships by adding them to the board.
uploadShipCoordinates(int, int, String) - Method in class database.DatabaseConnector
Uploads the coordinates of your ships
uploadShipCoordinates(String) - Method in class database.DatabaseConnector
Uploads the coordinates of your ships using DatabaseConnector.uploadShipCoordinates(int, int, String)
url - Variable in class database.ConnectionPool
The url for the JDBC connections
usedConnections - Variable in class database.ConnectionPool
ArrayList of connections in use
userId - Variable in class model.BattleshipUser
 
userJoined(Game) - Method in class database.DatabaseConnector
Checks if a user has joined the game
username - Variable in class controller.JoinGameController.RowData
 
username - Variable in class controller.LeaderboardController.LeaderboardRowData
 
username - Variable in class model.BattleshipUser
 
USERNAME_MAX_LENGTH - Static variable in class controller.SignupController
 
usernameExists(String) - Static method in class database.Login
